Detailed Description

Description: Implements basic drawing functionality. This forms a hardware abstraction layer which requires a backend for rendering.

USHORT Draw_TextWidth ( DISPLAY_DRIVER_STRUCT *  pstDisplay_,
DRAW_TEXT_STRUCT *  pstText_ 
)

Returns the width of the text string (in pixels), as it would be drawn to the screen, without actually drawing it to the screen.

Parameters:
pstDisplay_ - pointer to the display driver
pstText_ - text object to determine the rendering width
